def minimal_ugliness(heights):
    """
    Calculate the minimal ugliness score for a given histogram.

    Parameters:
    heights (list of int): A list of integers representing the heights of the histogram bars.

    Returns:
    int: The minimal ugliness score.
    """
    n = len(heights)
    if n == 1:
        return heights[0]
    an = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if i == 0 and heights[0] > heights[1]:
            an += heights[0] - heights[1]
            heights[0] = heights[1]
        if i > 0 and i < n - 1:
            if heights[i] > heights[i - 1] and heights[i] > heights[i + 1]:
                an += heights[i] - max(heights[i - 1], heights[i + 1])
                heights[i] = max(heights[i - 1], heights[i + 1])
            an += abs(heights[i] - heights[i - 1])
        if i == n - 1 and heights[n - 1] > heights[n - 2]:
            an += heights[n - 1] - heights[n - 2]
            heights[n - 1] = heights[n - 2]
    an -= heights[0]
    an += heights[n - 1]
    an += abs(heights[n - 1] - heights[n - 2])
    return an
